page.title: 17CHILDRENS GAMES.
page.content: In the early{20th Century}the children didn't have much time for playing games{"Hoop and stick"}was a very popular game.Some people could not afford to buy the hoop and stick so used the{hoop}off the{barrel}and used a twig from the garden.{"Hopscotch"} was played quite a lot because no special gear was needed.{"Hot ollen"} didn't need any special equipment either.It was{like hide and seek.}Most boys played football and cricket. Nowadays people play{games}that need{ {batteries}such as{"Simon"}where you have to copy a sequence of colours. Games are more advanced when played on a{computer,}such as{Space Invaders}and Pac Man. If it wasn't for{computers}we would not be doing this{DOMESDAY PROJECT.
